project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a simple contact book application to allow users to add, search, update, and delete contacts, with data stored in a JSON file. The application will interact with users through the terminal.

task.name: Implement feature to search for contacts
Implement feature to update existing contacts
Implement functionality to load contacts from a JSON file
Implement functionality to save contacts to a JSON file
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
